long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,:
Online Photo Collage Maker is a very simple and intutive tool which can be used by anyone for making impressive photo collage. This extension offers you different layouts beginning with 2 pics and goes upto layout for 7 pics.

This photo collage builder allows you to choose a photo of your choice from your local folders and then you can adjust picture position easily with mouse. You may also apply different filters to suit your mood. Photo Collage creator also allows you to modify collage dimensions as per your choice as well as the collage border color. This Photo collage generator is free of cost but supported with some google ads to cover hosting and development costs. Hope you bear with us!

If you face any problem or bug, please report it at bigdreams564@gmail.com
long.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,:
Want to make a photo collage for free?

Our photo collage maker for chrome can help you!

Photo Collage Maker for Chrome is a very simple and intutive tool which can be used by anyone for making impressive photo collage. This extension offers you different layouts beginning with 2 pics and goes upto layout for as many pics as you like. All you need to do is to toggle frame and column number as per your need.

This photo collage builder allows you to choose a photo of your choice from your local folders and then you can adjust picture position easily with mouse. You may also apply different background (transparent, color or photo) to suit your mood. Photo Collage creator also allows you to modify collage dimensions as per your choice as well as the collage border color.

We also have an outstanding Online Photo Collage Maker tool available just for you! Try this simple online tool on this link https://collage.chromecrxstore.com/

Bonus: We aim to enhance the environmental friendliness of our extension. As part of our efforts, we provide you with the opportunity to engage in carbon offsetting at no cost, as it is 100% supported by our affiliate partners. This is an optional feature, allowing you to decide whether you'd like to participate once you download the extension.  This feature comes pre-activated when you download extension. However if you don't like it then you can deactivate by going to https://impactbro.com/manage-settings or clicking on the 'Manage Settings' link located at the bottom left corner of the extension tab.
